name: Mountain Run (NaSolid)
description:
Relaxing game made during the Extra Credits Game Jam #3. The goal of the game is to just relax and enjoy the ride with the music and atmosphere. The theme of cycles was represented in multiple ways: day/night cycle, seasons, music, procedural generation and the unicycle.

Controls:
- Space Bar: Jump, respawn if dead
- Arrows: Turn in the air

The game was made by a team of 4 over the course of 2 days.
Programmers: Hans, Nicolas, Sébastien
Art: Janko
Music: Sébastien

Windows, OSX and Linux versions available but the OSX and Linux exports are highly untested :^) Just tell us if there are any issues or bugs and we'll look into it.
